text: Christine Todd Whitman (sometimes called Christie; born September 26, 1946) is a former American Republican Governor. She served New Jersey (January 1994 to January 2001). She was also the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (2001-03). She is so far the only female governor from New Jersey. Todd Whitman was born in New York City. ==References== Category:Administrators of the United States Environmental Protection Agency Category:Governors of New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Christine Todd Whitman
